oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Competition and Living Lab Platform (Annex 74) Science & Technology (Subtask A) Focus Report 3: Project Facts Template
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Müller, Jan Martin
Voss, Karsten
Spiker, Olivia
Balcerzak, Andrea
Rottschy, Frauke
Krapmeier, Helmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The focus report “Project Facts Template” contains a series of templates designed for summarizing quanti-tative information on competition buildings. Design, planning and implementation of the contributions to a building competition such as the Solar Decathlon are a continuous process during the whole competition. A number of characteristic facts and indicators of the buildings are created, which identify in detail their prop-erties and expectations. It is target of the template to systematically record and update the project facts and indicators for the buildings and technical systems. The template is linked to a systematic structure of all relevant data sheets of the products applied.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fakultät für Architektur und Bauingenieurwesen » Architektur » Veröffentlichungen
